autoDiff.title: Auto Diff
autoDiff.description: Automatically recalculates the diff when one of the editors changes.

diffWords.title: Show Word Diff
diffWords.description: Diffs the words between each line when this box is checked.

ignoreWhitespace.title: Ignore Whitespace
ignoreWhitespace.description: Will not diff whitespace when this box is checked.

turnOffSoftWrap.title: Disable Soft Wrap During Diff
turnOffSoftWrap.description: Temporarily disables soft wrap during diff (restores when finished). Soft wrap is now fully supported, but you can enable this for the classic behavior.

muteNotifications.title: Mute Notifications
muteNotifications.description: Mutes all warning notifications when this box is checked.

hideDocks.title: Hide Docks
hideDocks.description: Hides all docks (Tree View, Github, etc) during diff - shows when finished.

scrollSyncType.title: Sync Scrolling
scrollSyncType.description: Syncs the scrolling of the editors.

addedColorSide.title: Added Color Side
addedColorSide.description: The side that the latest version of the file is on. The added color will be applied to this editor and the removed color will be opposite.

overrideThemeColors.title: Override Highlight Colors
overrideThemeColors.description: Override the line highlight colors (defined by variables in your selected syntax theme) with the colors selected below.

addedColor.title: Added Custom Color
addedColor.description: The color that will be used for highlighting added lines when **Override Highlight Colors** is checked.

removedColor.title: Removed Custom Color
removedColor.description: The color that will be used for highlighting removed lines when **Override Highlight Colors** is checked.
